pr_title: Fix the queue not going to IN_PROGRESS state

timeline.message:
Fix the queue not going to IN_PROGRESS state

This commit fixed the scenario where the workflow context does not change
to IN_PROGRESS when it does not contain any job that needs to be run.

timeline.bodyText:
workflowCtx.getWorkflowState() is not going to be null right? If it could return null, we should do a reverse check.
Also, for enums, == would be the standard for comparison vs using equals().
